description: Verify that the create test plan page loads correctly with proper authentication
scenario: Admin user navigates to the test plan creation form to create a new test plan
expected_results: Display the create test plan form with all sections, fields, and validation
procedure:
1. Log in as admin user
2. Navigate to /admin/system-test/test-plans/new
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check header with 'Create Test Plan' title
5. Verify form sections are properly displayed

description: Verify that non-admin users cannot access the test plan creation form
scenario: Regular user attempts to access test plan creation functionality
expected_results: Access should be denied with 403 Forbidden error
procedure:
1. Log in as regular user (non-admin)
2. Attempt to navigate to /admin/system-test/test-plans/new
3. Verify 403 Forbidden error is returned
4. Check redirect to appropriate error page
5. Ensure no test plan creation form is accessible

description: Verify the page header displays correct title, description, and navigation
scenario: Admin views the page header to understand context and navigation options
expected_results: Display header with 'Create Test Plan' title, description, and back button
procedure:
1. Navigate to create test plan page
2. Check title 'Create Test Plan' is displayed prominently
3. Verify description 'Create a new system test plan'
4. Confirm 'Back to List' button navigates to test plans list
5. Check proper styling and animations (animate-fade-in-up)

description: Verify the form layout uses proper grid structure and responsive design
scenario: Admin views form layout on different screen sizes to ensure proper organization
expected_results: Form uses 2-column layout (main content + sidebar) with proper responsive behavior
procedure:
1. View form on desktop (1920x1080) - verify 2-column layout
2. Test on tablet view (768px width) - verify layout adaptation
3. Check mobile view (375px width) - verify single column stacking
4. Confirm lg:col-span-2 and sidebar spacing work correctly
5. Verify all sections remain accessible on all screen sizes

description: Verify the basic information section displays all required fields correctly
scenario: Admin fills out basic information fields to create test plan foundation
expected_results: Display basic information section with test plan number, module name, and screen design reference fields
procedure:
1. Locate 'Basic Information' section with blue border and info icon
2. Verify test plan number field is present and required (marked with red asterisk)
3. Check module name field is present and required
4. Confirm screen design reference field is optional
5. Verify proper grid layout (md:grid-cols-2) for first two fields

description: Verify that required fields are properly marked and validated
scenario: Admin observes required field indicators and attempts form submission with missing data
expected_results: Required fields show red asterisk (*) and prevent form submission when empty
procedure:
1. Check test plan number field shows red asterisk after label
2. Verify module name field shows red asterisk
3. Confirm description field shows red asterisk
4. Check expected results field shows red asterisk
5. Verify procedure field shows red asterisk

description: Verify the test details section displays description, scenario, and expected results fields
scenario: Admin fills out test details to define test objectives and expectations
expected_results: Display test details section with description, scenario, and expected results fields with proper validation
procedure:
1. Locate 'Test Details' section with green border and clipboard icon
2. Verify description field is required and properly styled
3. Check scenario textarea is optional with helpful placeholder
4. Confirm expected results textarea is required
5. Verify helper text is displayed under each field

description: Verify the test procedure section provides proper textarea for step-by-step instructions
scenario: Admin enters detailed test procedure steps with proper formatting assistance
expected_results: Display test procedure section with large textarea, monospace font, and helpful placeholder
procedure:
1. Locate 'Test Procedure' section with purple border and list icon
2. Verify procedure textarea is required (red asterisk)
3. Check monospace font styling (font-mono text-sm)
4. Confirm 8 rows height and proper placeholder text
5. Verify helper text explains step format

description: Verify the test configuration section provides dropdowns for status, priority, and category
scenario: Admin configures test plan properties using dropdown selections
expected_results: Display test configuration section with three dropdowns for test metadata
procedure:
1. Locate 'Test Configuration' section with orange border and gear icon
2. Verify test status dropdown with options: pending, passed, failed, skipped
3. Check priority dropdown with options: low, medium, high, critical
4. Confirm category dropdown with options: functional, ui, performance, security, integration
5. Verify proper default selections and styling

description: Verify that dropdown fields have appropriate default values selected
scenario: Admin views form with pre-selected sensible defaults for new test plans
expected_results: Dropdowns show appropriate default selections for new test plan creation
procedure:
1. Load create test plan form
2. Check test status defaults to appropriate value (typically 'pending')
3. Verify priority defaults to 'medium'
4. Confirm category defaults to 'functional'
5. Ensure defaults match typical new test plan requirements

description: Verify the help guidelines section provides useful tips for form completion
scenario: Admin references guidelines to understand form completion best practices
expected_results: Display help section with blue styling and useful form completion tips
procedure:
1. Locate help section with blue background (bg-blue-50)
2. Verify lightbulb icon and 'Guidelines' header
3. Check presence of helpful tips in list format
4. Confirm tips use check-circle icons
5. Verify text is readable with appropriate blue styling

description: Verify the form actions section provides proper submit and cancel buttons
scenario: Admin completes form and uses action buttons to submit or cancel
expected_results: Display form actions with cancel and create buttons properly positioned
procedure:
1. Locate form actions at bottom of form
2. Verify 'Cancel' button navigates to test plans list
3. Check 'Create Test Plan' button submits form
4. Confirm proper button styling and spacing
5. Verify save icon on submit button

description: Verify that form submission creates new test plan correctly
scenario: Admin fills out complete form and submits to create new test plan
expected_results: Form submission creates test plan and redirects to test plans list with success message
procedure:
1. Fill out all required fields with valid data
2. Submit form using 'Create Test Plan' button
3. Verify POST request to /admin/system-test/test-plans/new
4. Check test plan is created in database
5. Confirm redirect to test plans list with success flash message

description: Verify that form validation prevents submission with missing required fields
scenario: Admin attempts to submit form with missing required information
expected_results: Form validation prevents submission and highlights missing required fields
procedure:
1. Leave required fields empty (test_plan_no, module_name, description, expected_results, procedure)
2. Attempt to submit form
3. Verify form validation prevents submission
4. Check required fields are highlighted with red borders
5. Confirm validation error messages are displayed

description: Verify that client-side JavaScript validation works correctly
scenario: Admin experiences real-time form validation and assistance
expected_results: JavaScript validation provides immediate feedback and form assistance
procedure:
1. Test JavaScript form validation on required fields
2. Verify red border highlighting for invalid fields
3. Check validation alert for incomplete submission
4. Test form validation reset when fields are corrected
5. Confirm JavaScript enhancement doesn't break basic form functionality

description: Verify that test plan number auto-generation works when module is selected
scenario: Admin selects module and observes test plan number suggestion
expected_results: Test plan number field shows suggested value when module is entered
procedure:
1. Enter module name in module_name field
2. Check if test plan number field gets auto-populated
3. Verify auto-generation uses appropriate format (STP-XXX-XX)
4. Confirm auto-generation only occurs for new test plans
5. Test that manual override of auto-generated number works

description: Verify that procedure textarea provides auto-numbering assistance
scenario: Admin enters procedure steps and receives formatting assistance
expected_results: Procedure textarea provides auto-numbering when Enter is pressed after numbered step
procedure:
1. Enter first step as '1. Step description'
2. Press Enter and verify auto-generation of '2. '
3. Test continuation of numbering for multiple steps
4. Verify numbering works correctly with existing content
5. Check that feature enhances but doesn't interfere with manual entry

description: Verify that form fields have appropriate placeholder text and help information
scenario: Admin views form fields to understand expected input format and content
expected_results: All form fields display helpful placeholder text and descriptions
procedure:
1. Check procedure textarea has step format placeholder
2. Verify scenario field has descriptive placeholder
3. Confirm all fields have helpful descriptions below them
4. Check that placeholder text doesn't interfere with actual input
5. Verify placeholder styling is appropriate (gray, non-intrusive)

description: Verify proper error handling when form submission fails
scenario: Form submission encounters server-side errors or validation issues
expected_results: Display appropriate error messages and maintain form data
procedure:
1. Simulate server error during form submission
2. Verify error flash message is displayed
3. Check that form data is preserved after error
4. Confirm error message is clear and actionable
5. Verify error logging occurs on server side

description: Verify that CSRF token is properly included and validated
scenario: Form submission includes proper CSRF protection against attacks
expected_results: CSRF token is present in form and validated on submission
procedure:
1. Check form includes hidden CSRF token field
2. Verify token value is properly generated
3. Test form submission with valid token succeeds
4. Attempt submission without token and verify rejection
5. Confirm CSRF protection doesn't interfere with legitimate use

description: Verify that form sections have appropriate colored borders and visual hierarchy
scenario: Admin views form sections to understand organization and visual structure
expected_results: Form sections use appropriate border colors: blue (basic info), green (test details), purple (procedure), orange (config)
procedure:
1. Check 'Basic Information' section has blue left border (border-l-4 border-blue-500)
2. Verify 'Test Details' section has green left border (border-l-4 border-green-500)
3. Confirm 'Test Procedure' section has purple left border (border-l-4 border-purple-500)
4. Check 'Test Configuration' section has orange left border (border-l-4 border-orange-500)
5. Verify section headers have matching icon colors

description: Verify that all input fields have consistent styling and focus states
scenario: Admin interacts with form fields to ensure consistent user experience
expected_results: All input fields use consistent styling with proper focus indicators and colors
procedure:
1. Check text inputs have consistent border and padding
2. Verify focus states show blue ring (focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500)
3. Confirm dark mode compatibility for all inputs
4. Test textarea styling matches other inputs
5. Verify dropdown styling is consistent with other fields

description: Verify that the form displays correctly in both light and dark themes
scenario: Admin switches between light and dark modes to ensure proper theming support
expected_results: All form elements display with appropriate colors and contrast in both themes
procedure:
1. View form in light mode
2. Switch to dark mode (if theme toggle available)
3. Verify all text remains readable with proper contrast
4. Check form sections use appropriate dark theme colors
5. Confirm input fields adapt properly to dark theme

description: Verify that the page title shows 'Create Test Plan' in browser tab
scenario: Admin views browser tab title to understand current page context
expected_results: Browser tab shows 'Create Test Plan' title
procedure:
1. Navigate to create test plan page
2. Check browser tab title shows 'Create Test Plan'
3. Verify title is clear and descriptive
4. Confirm title helps with browser history and bookmarking
5. Check title distinguishes from other admin pages

description: Verify that the form meets accessibility standards for screen readers and keyboard navigation
scenario: Admin and accessibility tools test form for compliance with accessibility standards
expected_results: Form is fully accessible via keyboard navigation and screen readers
procedure:
1. Navigate entire form using only keyboard (Tab, Enter, arrows)
2. Test with screen reader for proper label reading
3. Verify focus indicators are visible on all interactive elements
4. Check required field indicators are announced by screen readers
5. Confirm proper semantic HTML structure and ARIA labels

description: Verify form works correctly across different web browsers
scenario: Admin accesses form using various browsers to ensure cross-browser compatibility
expected_results: Form displays and functions correctly in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers
procedure:
1. Test form in Google Chrome (latest version)
2. Verify functionality in Mozilla Firefox
3. Check display and features in Safari (if available)
4. Test in Microsoft Edge browser
5. Confirm all interactive elements and JavaScript work in each browser

description: Verify that form loads and responds quickly with good performance
scenario: Admin measures form loading time and interaction responsiveness
expected_results: Form loads within 2 seconds and provides responsive interaction
procedure:
1. Measure form page load time
2. Test JavaScript enhancement loading
3. Check input field responsiveness
4. Verify form submission performance
5. Confirm no memory leaks or performance issues

description: Verify that form integrates properly with site navigation and workflow
scenario: Admin navigates to and from form as part of test management workflow
expected_results: Form provides seamless integration with test management navigation
procedure:
1. Navigate to form from test plans list
2. Use 'Back to List' button to return
3. Navigate to form from dashboard
4. Test breadcrumb navigation if available
5. Verify all navigation maintains proper context

description: Verify that form data is properly handled during navigation and errors
scenario: Admin fills form, encounters issues, and expects data preservation
expected_results: Form data is preserved appropriately during error conditions
procedure:
1. Fill out form partially
2. Trigger validation error or server error
3. Verify entered data is preserved
4. Test browser back button behavior
5. Confirm no data loss during normal operation

description: Verify complete success flow from form creation to test plan list
scenario: Admin completes entire workflow from form creation to viewing created test plan
expected_results: Complete workflow provides seamless test plan creation and confirmation
procedure:
1. Navigate to create form from test plans list
2. Fill out complete form with valid data
3. Submit form successfully
4. Verify redirect to test plans list
5. Confirm new test plan appears in list with correct data
6. Verify success message is displayed
7. Test navigation to view created test plan
